page.title: 14 WANDLEBURY BIRDS
page.content: 57 resident species breed here, 43 other species recorded. Abundant food. Insect life encouraged by leaving sheep droppings and rotten wood lying. Wild flowers, berried shrubs, hawthorn all planted for their seeds. Thistles left for finches. 140 bird boxes, 100 in use by blue tits, great tits, coal tits, tawny owls, stock doves, spotted fly-catcher, robins, grey squirrels. COMMON BIRDS Wood pigeon, starling, house sparrow, chaffinch BIRDS OF PREY Sparrow hawk, kestrel hawk, tawny owl, little owl, short eared owl (common crow and jay). SUMMER MIGRANTS Swallow, chiff chaff, lesser and common whitethroat, nightingale, gold crest, willow warbler. WINTER MIGRANTS Brambling, field fare, redwing, yellow hammer, green finch. RARE BIRDS Icterine warbler,wryneck, osprey 1975.
